title: [1.9.9] Change in DragAndDrop causes NPE

labels.name: need more info
labels.description: needs more info. Likely to be closed when no reaction given.

body:
Please ensure you have given all the following requested information in your report.

#### Issue details
Due to a change between 1.9.8 and 1.9.9 in the DragAndDrop class (actual change is here: https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/gdx-parent-1.9.9/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/utils/DragAndDrop.java#L75) the updated version causes the `dragStop` to be called while still in `drag`. Using a watch on the payload I was able to trace it through a cascade of `dragActor.remove` -> `parent.removeActor` -> `stage.unfocus` -> `cancelTouchFocus` -> ... some event classes in between ... -> `listener.dragStop` (the one inside `DragAndDrop.addSource`). This sequence of events causes payload to be reset and thus causes an NPE at line 105 (https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/gdx-parent-1.9.9/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/utils/DragAndDrop.java#L105)

#### Reproduction steps/code
Just implement the DragAndDrop and it should happen as soon as you start dragging.

#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies
LibGDX: 1.9.9+ 

#### Stacktrace
```java
Exception in thread "LWJGL Application" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.DragAndDrop$1.drag(DragAndDrop.java:105)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.DragListener.touchDragged(DragListener.java:61)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.InputListener.handle(InputListener.java:62)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage.touchDragged(Stage.java:314)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglInput.processEvents(LwjglInput.java:345)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglApplication.mainLoop(LwjglApplication.java:217)
	at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglApplication$1.run(LwjglApplication.java:126)
```

#### Please select the affected platforms
- [X] Android
- [X] iOS (robovm)
- [X] iOS (MOE)
- [X] HTML/GWT
- [X] Windows
- [X] Linux
- [X] MacOS
